prompt.text: Hi, my name is [AGENT NAME]. I'll be working with you in this activity. Take a minute to introduce yourselves.

<< Here's a picture of that lab setup. How did the colors of the liquids change over time?
<< Here's a picture of what the experiment looked like after 1 hour, and after 24 hours.
What do the changes in color inside and outside tell you about the movement of starch and iodine molecules?
There might be more going on, as well.|On the whiteboard, here's the weight of the dialysis tube at the three observed points in time.
What happened to the weight of the tube over time?

Great discussion, everyone.
